International signature campaign conducted in Guinea
articles.content:
International signature campaign conducted in Guinea 
    Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- An international signature campaign supporting the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and demanding the immediate withdrawal of the U.S. forces from South Korea was held in Guinea from April 5 to May 8.
 The chiefs of staff of the army and the navy, the commanders of the Kamaene barracks and the Alpha Yaya Diallo barracks of the Guinean army, the head of the escort corps of the presidential office and the secretary general of the staff of the Guinean military police signed the signature paper on behalf of a total of 6,600 servicemen.    
 The vice-chairman of the economic and social council who is also vice-chairman of the Guinea-Korea friendship association, officials of the ministry of foreign affairs and cooperation of the presidential office and editors-in-chief of the radio broadcast and the TV broadcast signed the signature paper on behalf of more than 300 personages and journalists.

DPRK judoists prove successful at third Asian Youth Judo Championships
articles.content:
DPRK judoists prove successful at third Asian Youth Judo Championships 
    Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK judoists gave a good account of themselves at the Third Asian Youth Judo Championships in Damascus.
 Pak Myong Hui and Hong Ok Song respectively came first in the female 52 kg and 57 kg categories.    
 Hong Chol Jun took the third place in the male 60 kg category and Kim Song Gum and Pak Ok Song in the female 45kg and 48kg categories.
